title: Where is the Demacia Vice loot?
body: The [news page about the active event](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/editorial/learn-more-arcade-2019) says that there's Demacia Vice loot, like chromas and emotes. However, when I look at what's available for tokens, I only see Arcade stuff. What am I missing here?
